Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Earring
Description: This earring is made of a silver wire that has an average thickness of 0,3 cm. It is coiled to form a simple but slightly flattened ring. The diametre of this ring varies from 1,1 to 1,3 cm. The silver wire is lightly twisted. Both extremities are sharp and are almost joined. Only a small gap separating the two extremities can be noticed, one almost superposed on to the other.
